name: 2 months game
description:
Welcome to my 2 months project.

A game where your goal is to kill the main tower. The main tower will be protected by the two small towers. You need to kill the two small towers protecting the main tower in order to kill the main tower.

Upgrade your items to make the process easier.

Each in game item will cost (No define cost yet).  Each item will provide you with extra power.

Earn coins by killing minions that are trying to damage your towers. Each minion will have it's own power. Some will be more powerful then others and also big in size.

If one or more towers dies on your side. The game is over. 

Controls

A - move left

D - move right

Available

The game is available on PC. I am planning to release it to more platforms in the future.

Feedbacks

You can leave a feedback comment in the "Comment section". Any feedbacks / tips will be appreciated.
